items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length skidder outside ff, doesn't get forward and just manages to get bat on this before it hits him on the pad
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on off stump, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: googly, length on middle stump. Leans in and flicks to midwicket's left
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: skidder keeps low outside off as Shakib opens up and shapes to punch. Just manages to keep it out
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length outside off, a googly. Pushed with the turn square into the open point region
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, driven to long-off with the turn
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, whipped to midwicket's left off the back foot with the angle. That's another fifty for Tamim. Third time he's reached the mark this series
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: arm ball, back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, jammed back down the pitch
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, steps out and goes inside-out to sweeper's left. Bit of aerobics by Cottrell out there as he flicks it back into play before crossing the boundary. Recovers and puts the throw back in. A long sprint and a one-handed pick up before all this
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: survives on the catch and then Shakib survives a run out at the other end. He gets a leading edge as he looks to close the face and it lands between Gayle and extra cover. Bishoo is the fielder there and he can't hit the stumps as Shakib struggles to make his ground
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, steps out and swipes off the inside half to midwicket
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: misfield after Tamim steps out and bludgeons this past Gayle. Holder at long-off is right there, but he let's it slip. Didn't even have a lot of running to do, that's poor.
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length on middle, steps out and drives to long-on
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball, steps out and offers the pad
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up at leg stump, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, gets back and clips through square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, dabbed to short third off the outside half
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length flat one in the corridor. Defended to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven with the turn to extra cover
items.postText: Ever wondered how ball-by-ball commentary evolved over the years? We look back at the beginning of it all, as part of ESPNcricinfo's 25-year celebrations.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full ball down leg side, can't get bat on the sweep
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide
